name: google_search
css: .sfbg {background-image: url({{image}}) !important; height: initial !important;} .logo a img {content: url(https://imgur.com/KE298oL.png)} #pTwnEc {background-color: transparent !important;} .c93Gbe {background-color: transparent !important;} .lnXdpd {content: url(https://imgur.com/KE298oL.png) !important;} .minidiv .sfbg {height: 72px !important;} #cnt {opacity: 1 !important; background-repeat: no-repeat !important; background-size: cover !important; background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(255,255,255,0) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 132px), url({{image}})}

name: wikipedia
css: #mw-head {background-image: url({{image}}); height: 15% !important;  -webkit-mask-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(rgba(0,0,0,1)), to(rgba(0,0,0,0))); mask-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,0,1), rgba(0,0,0,0));} #pt-anonuserpage { color: #ffffff !important;} a { color: #00b6ff !important;}
